title: Second First Church and Rockford Rescue Mission providing shelter from cold | Video | wrex.com
text: Second First Church and Rockford Rescue Mission providing shelter from cold Weather Alert ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing and drifting snow expected, mainly in open areas. Additional snow accumulations this morning less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on locally slippery road conditions, mainly in open areas. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. && ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing and drifting snow expected, mainly in open areas.
